documents.content:
# NPDES Permit Fee Schedule (2025-26)

## Municipal Stormwater Permits (MS4)

Fees based on population served:

| Population Served | Annual Fee |
|-------------------|------------|
| ≥ 250,000 | $27,293 |
| 100,000 - 249,999 | $21,835 |
| 50,000 - 99,999 | $18,196 |
| 25,000 - 49,999 | $18,196 |
| 10,000 - 24,999 | $10,920 |
| 1,000 - 9,999 | $7,279 |
| < 1,000 | $3,641 |

## Industrial Stormwater Permits

Fees based on acres of industrial activity:

| Industrial Acres | Annual Fee |
|------------------|------------|
| < 1 acre | $1,701 |
| 1 to < 5 acres | $1,723 |
| ≥ 5 acres | $1,873 |

## Construction Stormwater Permits

### General Construction Permit
- **Base fee:** $511
- **Plus:** $54 per acre of disturbed area
- **Maximum:** $11,311
- Calculated on total acreage disturbed over project life

### Rainfall Erosivity Waiver (Small Projects)
- **Fee:** $200
- For small construction projects meeting waiver criteria

### Broadband Projects (E.O. N-73-20)
- **Annual fee:** $10,000
- **Plus:** $54 per acre
- For programmatic statewide broadband construction

## Individual NPDES Permits

Fees vary by:
- Discharge type
- Volume
- Receiving water sensitivity
- Contact your [Regional Water Board](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/waterboards_map.html) for specifics

## Fee Payment

### When to Pay
- Annual fees: Due each fiscal year
- Application fees: At time of application
- Construction: Before permit issuance

### How to Pay
- Electronic payment preferred
- Check payable to State Water Board
- Include permit number on payment

## Fee Adjustments

- Fees may increase annually with CPI
- Check the [current fee schedule](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/fees/water_quality/) before applying
- FY 2025-26 schedule effective July 1, 2025

## Contact

**Fee Information:** [Water Quality Fee Schedule](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/fees/water_quality/)
**Fee Schedule Document:** [FY 2025-26 Fee Schedule (PDF)](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/fees/stakeholder/docs/2025/fy2526-wq-feeschedule.pdf)

## Take Action

1. **Look up your fee category** -- Review the [FY 2025-26 Fee Schedule (PDF)](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/fees/stakeholder/docs/2025/fy2526-wq-feeschedule.pdf) for specific fee amounts by permit type.
2. **Calculate your stormwater fees** -- Visit the [Water Quality Fee Schedule](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/resources/fees/water_quality/) page for fee calculators and additional guidance.
3. **Contact your Regional Board** -- Use the [Waterboards Map](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/waterboards_map.html) to find fee contacts for individual NPDES permits with site-specific conditions.
4. **Set up electronic payment** -- Prepare for annual billing by ensuring your permit number is current and payment records are up to date with the State Water Board.
